entry.title: WIND WARNING , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 8:37 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water overnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 then light early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the evening except gusting to 60 near the water late in the evening and overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
